info.summary:
Sebastiano Vigna works as a Associate professor in Dipartimento di Informatica,Università degli Studi di Milano, and his\her h-index is 41, g-index is 84. His\Her interests are :
 Data Structure; Distributed System; Lower Bound; Social Network; Search Engine;
